Package org.webcurator.core.permissionmapping

Interface Summary
HierPermMappingDAO DAO for the Hierarchical Permission Mapping Strategy.
 

Class Summary
DomainIterator The DomainIterator iterates through a hostname, progressively moving to a wider grouping of domains.
HierarchicalPermissionMappingStrategy The HierarchicalPermissionMappingStrategy is a strategy for fast searches to find permissions linked to URL Patterns that match a given seed.
HierPermMappingDAOImpl Implementation of the Hierarchical Permission Mapping DAO.
Mapping The Mapping class records mappings between UrlPatterns and Permissions based on effective base domains.
MappingView The MappingView class records mappings between UrlPatterns and Permissions based on effective base domains.
PermissionMappingStrategy Generic class for the PermissionMappingStrategy.
PermMappingSiteListener Listens for save/delete events on a site so that the permission/url pattern mappings can be updated.
UrlUtils A set of URL parsing utilities.
